svg.title: Additive animation of text rotate
svg.desc:
from-to animations are added with additive sum for rotate of text. The visible result for an additive behaviour is that the blue '?!$' covers exactly the red '?!$' without any visible animation effect. If the blue '?!$' rotates somehow and the red gets visible, the animation is not additive as indicated in grey.
Behaviour of different viewers:
Amaya 9.51: rotate not implemented yet, therefore it only looks like additive behaviour, but additive behaviour seems not to be implemented yet for any attribute or property KSVG1 (KDE, Konqueror plugin): see comment for Amaya Adobe plugin (3.01 Beta Release 1, Build 88): shows additive behaviour Squiggle 1.7: shows additive behaviour Opera 8.x: no animation at all Opera9tp1/2/beta1: first one or two glyphs not additive, last one or two glyphs additive Opera9beta2/ 9.00/9.10/ 9.50 alpha/beta: not additive
